# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-104">Entitätsdefinitionen für Typen vertraulicher Informationstypen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-105">Die Verhinderung von Datenverlust (Data Loss Prevention, DLP) im Compliance Center umfasst viele vertrauliche Informationstypen, die in Ihren DLP-Richtlinien verwendet werden können.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-106">Dieser Artikel enthält eine Liste aller typen vertraulicher Informationen und zeigt, nach welcher DLP-Richtlinie beim Erkennen der einzelnen Typen sucht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-107">Weitere Informationen zu Typen vertraulicher Informationen finden Sie unter [Typen vertraulicher Informationen.](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-108">ABA-Routingnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-110">neun Ziffern, die in einem formatierten oder unformatierten Muster vorliegen können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-111">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-112">zwei Ziffern in den Bereichen 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 oder 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-113">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-114">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-115">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-116">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-117">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-118">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-120">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-121">Eine Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt wird, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-122">Die Funktion Func_aba_routing findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-123">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ABA_Routing wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-124">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-125">Die Funktion Func_aba_routing findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-143">Nationale Identität (DNI) (Argentina National Identity)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-145">Acht Ziffern mit oder ohne Punkte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-146">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-147">Acht Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-148">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-149">optionaler Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-150">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-151">optionaler Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-152">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-153">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-154">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-155">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-156">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-157">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_argentina_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-158">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_argentina_national_id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-170">Argentinien Eindeutiger Steueridentifikationsschlüssel (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-172">Elf Ziffern mit Strich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-173">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-174">Elf Ziffern mit einem Strich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-175">zwei Ziffern in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 oder 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-176">ein Bindestrich (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-177">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-178">ein Bindestrich (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-179">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-180">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-182">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-183">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-184">Die Funktion `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-185">Es wird ein `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-186">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-187">Die Funktion `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-226">Australische Bankkontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-228">sechs bis zehn Ziffern mit oder ohne Bankstatus-Zweigstellennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-229">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-230">Die Kontonummer ist 6 bis 10 Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-231">Australische Bankleitzahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-232">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-233">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-234">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-235">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-236">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-237">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-238">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-239">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-240">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-241">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-242">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-243">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-244">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-260">Australische Geschäftsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-261">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-262">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-263">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-265">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-266">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-268">11 Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-269">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-270">11 Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-271">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-272">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-273">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-274">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-275">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-276">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-277">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-278">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-279">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-280">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-281">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-282">Die Funktion Func_australian_business_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-283">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_australian_business_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-284">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-285">Die Funktion Func_australian_business_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-295">Australische Firmennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-296">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-297">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-298">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-299">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-300">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-301">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-303">neun Ziffern mit Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-304">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-305">neun Ziffern mit Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-306">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-307">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-308">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-309">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-310">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-311">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-312">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-313">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-314">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-315">Die Funktion Func_Australian_Company_Number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-316">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australian_Company_Number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-317">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-318">Die Funktion Func_Australian_Company_Number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-328">Australische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-330">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-331">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-332">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-333">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-334">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-335">fünf Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-336">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-337">1 bis 2 optionale Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-338">vier bis neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-339">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-340">neun Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-341">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-342">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-343">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-344">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-345">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_australia_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-346">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-347">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-447">Australische Kontonummer für medizinisches Konto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-449">10-11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-450">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-451">10-11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-452">Erste Ziffer im Bereich von 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-453">Neun Ziffern sind eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-454">Zehnte Ziffer ist die Ausgabeziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-455">Elfte Ziffer (optional) ist die Einzelziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-456">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-459">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-460">Die Funktion Func_australian_medical_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-461">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-462">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-474">Australische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-476">acht oder neun alphanumerische Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-477">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-478">ein Buchstabe (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) gefolgt von 7 Ziffern oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-479">2 Buchstaben (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) gefolgt von 7 Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-480">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-481">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-482">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-483">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-484">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_australia_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-485">Es wird ein `Keyword_australia_passport_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-486">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-487">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_australia_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-507">Australische Steuerdateinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-509">acht bis neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-510">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-511">Acht bis neun Ziffern werden in der Regel wie folgt mit Leerzeichen dargestellt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-512">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-513">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-514">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-515">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-516">zwei bis drei Ziffern, bei denen die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-517">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-520">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-521">Die Funktion Func_australian_tax_file_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-522">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number oder Keyword_number_exclusions gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-523">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-524">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-524">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-525">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-528">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-528">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-529">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-529">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-532">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-532">individual tax return</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-535">Österreich-Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-537">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-538">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-539">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-540">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-541">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-542">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-543">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-544">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-545">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-546">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-547">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-547">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-548">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-548">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-549">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-549">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-550">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-550">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-551">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-551">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-552">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-552">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-553">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-553">driverlicences</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-672">Österreich-Identitätskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-673">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-674">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-675">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-676">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-677">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-678">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-680">Eine 24-stellige Kombination aus Buchstaben, Ziffern und Sonderzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-681">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-682">24 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-683">22 Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), Ziffern, umgekehrte Schrägstriche, Schrägstriche oder Pluszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-684">zwei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), Ziffern, umgekehrte Schrägstriche, Schrägstriche, Pluszeichen oder Gleichheitszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-685">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-686">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-687">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-688">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-689">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-690">Es wird ein  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-691">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-693">Identitätsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-696">Österreich-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-698">Ein Buchstabe gefolgt von einem optionalen Leerzeichen und sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-699">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-700">Eine Kombination aus einem Buchstaben, sieben Ziffern und einem Leerzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-701">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-702">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-703">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-704">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-705">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-706">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-707">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-708">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-709">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-710">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-711">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-712">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-713">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-737">Nummer der sozialen Sicherheit in Österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-739">10 Ziffern im angegebenen Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-740">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-741">10 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-742">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-743">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-744">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-745">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-747">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-748">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-749">Die Funktion  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-750">ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-751">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-752">Die Funktion  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-764">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-764">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-765">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-765">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-766">Sozialversicherung nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-766">social security no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-768">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-768">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-770">sozialversicherungsnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-770">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-772">sozialesicherheitkein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-778">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-780">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Bindestrich und Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-781">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-782">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Bindestrich und Schrägstrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-783">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-784">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-785">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-786">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-787">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-788">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-790">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-791">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-792">Die Funktion  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-793">Es wird ein  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-794">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-795">Die Funktion  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-818">Mehrwertsteuer in Österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-819">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-820">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-821">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-822">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-823">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-824">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-826">11-Zeichen-alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-827">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-828">Alphanumerisches 11-Zeichen-Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-829">A oder a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-830">T oder t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-831">Optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-832">U oder U</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-833">optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-834">zwei oder drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-835">optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-836">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-837">optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-838">eine oder zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-839">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-841">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-842">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-843">Die Funktion Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-844">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-845">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-846">Die Funktion Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-864">Azure DocumentDB-Authentifizierungsschlüssel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-866">Die Zeichenfolge "DocumentDb" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen im folgenden Muster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-867">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-868">Die Zeichenfolge "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-869">Beliebige Kombination aus 3-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-870">Ein Größer als Symbol (>), ein Gleichheitszeichen (=), ein Anführungszeichen (") oder ein Apostroph (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-871">Beliebige Kombination aus 86 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-872">Zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-873">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-874">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-875">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-876">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-877">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-878">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
