## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-893">Azure IAAS-Datenbankverbindungszeichenfolge und Azure SQL Verbindungszeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-894">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-895">Die Zeichenfolge "Server", "Server" oder "Datenquelle", gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen im folgenden Muster, einschließlich der Zeichenfolge "cloudapp.azure".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-896">com" oder "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-897">net" oder "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-898">net" und die Zeichenfolge "Password" oder "password" oder "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-899">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-900">die Zeichenfolge "Server", "Server" oder "Datenquelle"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-901">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-902">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-903">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-904">beliebige Kombination aus 1-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-905">Die Zeichenfolge "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-907">net" oder "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-909">beliebige Kombination aus 1-300 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-910">die Zeichenfolge "Password", "password" oder "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-911">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-912">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-913">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-914">ein oder mehrere Zeichen, die kein Semikolon sind (;), Anführungszeichen (") oder Apostroph (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-915">ein Semikolon (;), Anführungszeichen (") oder Apostroph (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-916">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-917">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-918">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-919">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-920">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-921">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-931">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-931">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-936">Azure IoT Verbindungszeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-938">Die Zeichenfolge "HostName" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen im folgenden Muster, einschließlich der Zeichenfolgen "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-939">net" und "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-940">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-941">die Zeichenfolge "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-942">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-943">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-944">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-945">beliebige Kombination aus 1-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-946">die Zeichenfolge "azure-devices.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-948">beliebige Kombination aus 1-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-949">die Zeichenfolge "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-950">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-951">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-952">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-953">beliebige Kombination aus 43 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-954">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-955">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-956">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-957">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-958">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-959">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-960">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-975">Azure-Veröffentlichungseinstellungskennwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-975">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-976">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-976">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-977">Die Zeichenfolge "userpwd=" gefolgt von einer alphanumerischen Zeichenfolge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-977">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-978">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-978">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-979">die Zeichenfolge "userpwd="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-979">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-980">beliebige Kombination aus 60 Kleinbuchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-980">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-981">anführungszeichen (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-981">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-982">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-983">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-984">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-985">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-985">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-986">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-986">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-987">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-987">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1002">Azure Redis-Cacheverbindungszeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1002">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1004">Die Zeichenfolge "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1005">net" gefolgt von den Im folgenden Muster beschriebenen Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen, einschließlich der Zeichenfolge "password" oder "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1006">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1007">die Zeichenfolge "redis.cache.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1008">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1009">beliebige Kombination aus 1-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1010">die Zeichenfolge "password" oder "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1010">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1011">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1012">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1013">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1014">beliebige Kombination aus 43 Zeichen, die Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+) sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1015">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1016">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1017">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1018">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1019">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1020">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1021">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1038">Die Zeichenfolge "sig" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen, die im folgenden Muster beschrieben sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1039">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1040">die Zeichenfolge "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1041">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1042">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1043">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1044">beliebige Kombination aus 43 bis 53 Zeichen, die Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern oder das Prozentzeichen (%) sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1045">die Zeichenfolge "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1046">jedes Zeichen, das kein Klein- oder Großbuchstabe, keine Ziffer oder kein Prozentzeichen ist (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1047">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1048">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1049">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1050">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1051">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureSAS findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1102">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1103">Null bis zwei Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1104">beliebige Kombination aus 86 Zeichen, die Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+) sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1105">zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1106">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1107">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1108">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1109">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1110">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1111">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1112">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1130">Azure Storage Kontoschlüssel (generisch)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1131">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1132">Jede Kombination aus 86 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+), vor oder gefolgt von den Zeichen, die im folgenden Muster beschrieben sind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1133">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1134">Null zu einem der größeren Zeichen (>), Apostroph ('), Gleichheitszeichen (=), Anführungszeichen (") oder Nummernzeichen (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1135">beliebige Kombination aus 86 Zeichen, die Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Schrägstrich (/) oder Pluszeichen (+) sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1136">zwei Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1137">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1138">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1139">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1140">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1141">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1142">Belgische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1144">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1145">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1146">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1147">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1148">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1149">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1150">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1151">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1152">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1285">Nationale Belgische Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1287">11 Ziffern plus optionale Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1288">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1289">11 Ziffern plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1290">sechs Ziffern und zwei optionale Punkte im Format "YY". MM.DD für Geburtsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1291">Ein optionales Trennzeichen von Punkt, Strich, Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1292">drei sequenzielle Ziffern (ungerade für Männer, auch für Frauen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1293">Ein optionales Trennzeichen von Punkt, Strich, Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1294">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1295">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1296">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1297">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1298">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1299">Die Funktion Func_belgium_national_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1300">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_belgium_national_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1301">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1302">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1303">Die Funktion Func_belgium_national_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1304">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1363">Belgische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1365">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1366">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1367">zwei Buchstaben und gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1368">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1369">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1370">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1371">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1372">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1373">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1374">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY oder ein Schlüsselwort aus oder wird `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1375">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1376">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1377">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1404">Belgische Mehrwertsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1405">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1406">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1407">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1408">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1409">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1410">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1412">12-Zeichen-alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1413">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1414">Alphanumerisches 12-Zeichen-Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1415">Buchstabe B oder b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1416">ein Buchstabe E oder e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1417">eine Ziffer 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1418">eine Ziffer von 1 bis 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1419">optionaler Punkt oder Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1420">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1421">optionaler Punkt oder Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1422">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1423">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1424">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1425">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1426">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1427">Die Funktion Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1428">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1429">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1430">Die Funktion Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1431">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1431">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1442">Brasilien CPF-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1444">11 Ziffern, die eine Prüfziffer umfassen und die formatiert oder unformatiert sein können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1445">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1446">Formatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1447">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1448">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1449">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1450">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1451">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1452">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1453">zwei Ziffern, die Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1454">Unformatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1455">11 Ziffern, wobei die letzten beiden Ziffern Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1456">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1458">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1459">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1460">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cpf findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1461">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_cpf gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1462">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1463">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1464">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cpf findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1465">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1468">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1468">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1469">Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1469">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1470">Registrierung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1470">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1471">Umsatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1471">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1472">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1473">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1473">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1474">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1474">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1475">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1475">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1476">Receita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1476">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1477">#A0 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1479">14 Ziffern, die eine Registrierungsnummer, eine Zweignummer und Prüfnziffern sowie Trennzeichen umfassen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1480">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1481">14 Ziffern plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1482">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1483">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1484">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1485">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1486">drei Ziffern (diese ersten acht Ziffern sind die Registrierungsnummer)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1487">ein Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1488">vierstellige Verzweigungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1489">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1490">zwei Ziffern, die Prüfziffern sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1491">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1492">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1493">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1494">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1495">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cnpj findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1496">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_cnpj gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1497">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1498">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1499">Die Funktion Func_brazil_cnpj findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1500">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1511">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1511">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1512">Unternehmen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1512">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1513">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1513">CNPJ</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1514">Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1515">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1518">Pessoas jurídicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1518">Pessoas jurídicas</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1522">Brasilien National Identification Card (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1524">Registro Geral (altes Format): Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (neues Format): 11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1526">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1527">Registro Geral (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1528">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1529">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1530">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1531">ein Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1532">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1533">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1534">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1536">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1537">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1538">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1539">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1540">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1541">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1542">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1543">Die Funktion Func_brazil_rg findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1544">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_brazil_rg gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1545">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1546">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1546">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1547">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1548">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1549">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1553">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1553">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1554">RG (bei diesem Schlüsselwort wird die Zwischen-/Kleinschreibung beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1555">RIC (bei diesem Schlüsselwort wird die Zwischen-/Kleinschreibung beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1556">Kennzeichen des Bulgarien-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1558">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1559">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1560">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1561">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1562">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1563">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1564">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1565">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1566">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1693">Uniforme zivile Nummer für Bulgarien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1694">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1695">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1696">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1697">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1698">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1699">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1701">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1702">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1703">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1704">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1705">zwei Ziffern, die der Geburtsreihenfolge entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1706">eine Ziffer, die dem Geschlecht entspricht: Eine gleichmäßige Ziffer für männlich und eine ungerade Ziffer für frau</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1707">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1708">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1710">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1711">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1712">Die Funktion  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1713">Es wird ein  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1714">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1715">Die Funktion  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
