## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1760">Reisepassnummer für Bulgarien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1762">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1763">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1764">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1765">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1766">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1767">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1768">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1769">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1770">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1771">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1772">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1773">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1774">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1775">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1775">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1776">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1776">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1777">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1777">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1778">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1778">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1779">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1779">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1780">Pässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1780">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1781">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1781">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1782">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1782">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1794">Kanadische Bankkontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1796">7 oder 12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1797">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1798">Eine kanadische Bankkontonummer ist 7 oder 12 Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1799">Eine kanadische Bankkontonummer setzt sich wie folgt zusammen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1800">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1801">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1802">drei Ziffern OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1803">null "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1804">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1805">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1806">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1807">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1808">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1809">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1810">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1811">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1812">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1813">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1814">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1838">Kanadische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1840">Variiert je nach Provinz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1841">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1842">Verschiedene Muster in Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec und Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1843">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1844">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1845">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1846">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1847">Die Funktion Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1848">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1849">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_drivers_license wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />

        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1985">Kanadische Gesundheitsdienstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1987">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1988">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1989">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1990">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1991">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1992">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1993">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1994">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_health_service_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1995">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_health_service_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1996">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1996">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1998">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1998">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-1999">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-1999">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2000">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2000">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2001">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2001">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2002">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2002">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2003">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2003">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2004">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2004">psychiatrist</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2007">Kanadische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2008">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2009">zwei Großbuchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2010">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2011">zwei Großbuchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2012">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2013">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2013">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2014">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2015">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2016">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_passport_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2017">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_canada_passport_number oder Keyword_passport gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2047">Kanadische Persönliche Gesundheitsidentifikationsnummer (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2048">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2049">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2050">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2051">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2052">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2053">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2054">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2055">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2056">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_canada_phin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2057">Es werden mindestens zwei Schlüsselwörter Keyword_canada_phin oder Keyword_canada_provinces gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2090">Kanadische Sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2092">neun Ziffern mit optionalen Bindestrichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2093">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2094">Formatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2095">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2096">ein Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2097">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2098">ein Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2099">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2100">Unformatiert: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2101">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2102">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2103">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2104">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2105">Die Funktion Func_canadian_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2106">Mindestens zwei dieser eine beliebige Kombination der folgenden Aktionen aus:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2107">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2108">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin_collaborative wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2109">Die Funktion Func_eu_date findet ein Datum in das richtige Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2110">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2111">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2112">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_canadian_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2113">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2114">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2139">Chile-Identitätskartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2141">sieben bis acht Ziffern plus Trennzeichen einer Prüfziffer oder eines Buchstabens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2142">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2143">sieben bis acht Ziffern plus Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2144">ein bis zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2145">optionaler Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2146">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2147">optionaler Zeitraum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2148">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2149">ein Strich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2150">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall), bei der es sich um eine Prüfziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2151">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2152">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2153">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2154">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2155">Die Funktion Func_chile_id_card nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2156">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_chile_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2157">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2158">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2159">Die Funktion Func_chile_id_card nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2160">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2197">China Resident Identity Card (PRC) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2199">18 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2200">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2201">18 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2202">sechs Ziffern, die ein Adresscode sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2203">acht Ziffern im Format YYYYMMDD, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2204">drei Ziffern, die ein Bestellcode sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2205">eine Ziffer, die eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2206">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2207">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2208">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2209">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2210">Die Funktion Func_china_resident_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2211">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_china_resident_id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2212">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2213">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2214">Die Funktion Func_china_resident_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2215">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2216">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2216">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2218">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2218">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2219">PRC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2219">PRC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2222">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2222">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2223">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2224">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2224">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2225">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2225">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2226">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2226">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2227">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2227">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2228">Kreditkartennummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2230">14 bis 16 Ziffern, die formatiert oder unformatiert (ddddddddddd) sein können und den Luhn-Test bestehen müssen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2231">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2232">Komplexes und robustes Muster, das Karten von allen wichtigen Marken weltweit erkennt, einschließlich Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, Geschenkkarten und Dinerkarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2233">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2234">Ja, die Luhn-Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2235">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2236">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2237">Die Funktion Func_credit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2238">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2239">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_cc_verification wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2240">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_cc_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2241">Die Funktion Func_expiration_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2242">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2243">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2244">Die Funktion Func_credit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2245">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2505">Kroatische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2507">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2508">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2509">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2510">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2511">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2512">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2513">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2514">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2515">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2639">Kroatische Identitätskartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2640">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp "NATIONALE IDENTIFIKATIONSNUMMER" der EU enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2641">Es ist als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2642">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2643">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2644">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2645">neun aufeinander folgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2646">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2647">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2648">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2649">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2650">Die Funktion Func_croatia_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2651">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_croatia_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2682">Kroatische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2684">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2685">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2686">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2687">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2688">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2689">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2690">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2691">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2692">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2693">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2694">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2695">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2696">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2714">Kroatische Persönliche Identifikationsnummer (OIB)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2715">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2716">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2717">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2718">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2719">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2720">Die letzte Ziffer ist eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2721">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2722">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2723">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2724">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2725">Die Funktion Func_croatia_oib_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2726">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2727">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2728">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2729">Die Funktion Func_croatia_oib_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2730">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2731">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2731">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2732">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2732">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2761">Führerscheinnummer der Zyprischen Treiber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2763">12 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2764">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2765">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2766">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2767">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2768">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2769">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2770">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2771">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2896">Identitätskarte für Zypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2897">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2898">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2899">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2900">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2901">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2902">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2904">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2905">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2906">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2907">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2908">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2909">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2910">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2911">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2912">Es wird ein  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2913">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2913">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2915">ID-Kartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2915">id card number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2921">Reisepassnummer für Zypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2923">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von 6 bis 8 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2924">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2925">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sechs bis acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2926">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2927">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2928">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2929">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2930">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2931">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2932">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` findet Datum im Format DD/MM/JJJJ oder ein Schlüsselwort wird `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2933">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2934">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2935">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2964">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Zypern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2965">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2966">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2967">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2968">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2969">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2970">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2972">Acht Ziffern und ein Buchstabe im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2973">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2974">acht Ziffern und ein Buchstabe:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2975">eine "0" oder "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2976">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2977">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2978">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2979">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2980">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2981">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2982">Die Funktion  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2983">Es wird ein  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2984">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-2985">Die Funktion  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
