## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3013">Kennzeichen des tschechischen Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3015">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3016">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3017">acht Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3018">Buchstabe "E" (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3019">ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3020">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3021">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3022">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3023">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3024">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3025">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3026">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3027">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3153">Tschechische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3155">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3156">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3157">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3158">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3159">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3160">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3161">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3162">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3163">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3164">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3165">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3166">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3167">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3189">Persönliche Identitätsnummer der Tschechischen Republik</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3191">neun Ziffern mit optionalem Schrägstrich (altes Format) 10 Ziffern mit optionalem Schrägstrich (neues Format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3192">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3193">neun Ziffern (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3194">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3195">Optionaler Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3196">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3197">10 Ziffern (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3198">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3199">Optionaler Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3200">vier Ziffern, bei denen die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3201">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3202">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3203">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3204">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3205">Die Funktion Func_czech_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3206">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_czech_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3207">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3208">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3209">Die Funktion Func_czech_id_card_new_format findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3210">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3257">Führerscheinnummer des Dänischen Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3259">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3260">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3261">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3262">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3263">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3264">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3265">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3266">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3267">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3391">Dänische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3393">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3394">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3395">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3396">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3397">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3398">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3399">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3400">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3401">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3402">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format DD MM JJ oder ein `Regex_eu_passport_date2` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3403">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3404">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3405">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3425">Persönliche Identifikationsnummer für Dänemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3427">10 Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3428">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3429">10 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3430">sechs Ziffern im Format DDMMYY, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3431">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3432">vier Ziffern, bei denen die letzte Ziffer eine Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3433">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3434">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3435">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3436">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3437">Der reguläre Ausdruck Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3438">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_denmark_id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3439">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3440">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3441">Der reguläre Ausdruck Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3442">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3514">Nummer der Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3516">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3517">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3518">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3519">ein Buchstabe (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung) aus dieser Gruppe möglicher Buchstaben: abcdefghjklmnprstux, bei dem es sich um einen Registrierungscode handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3520">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall), der der erste Buchstabe des Nachnamens oder der Ziffer "9" des Registranten ist.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3521">sieben Ziffern, von denen die letzte die Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3522">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3523">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3524">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3525">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3526">Die Funktion Func_dea_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3527">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keyword_dea_number` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3528">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3529">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3530">Die Funktion Func_dea_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3531">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3532">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3536">Verwaltung der Erzwingung von Rauschgiften</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3537">Drug Enforcement Agency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3538">Kennzeichen des Estnes-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3540">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3541">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3542">zwei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3543">die Buchstaben "ET" (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3544">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3545">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3546">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3547">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3548">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3549">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3550">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3677">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3678">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3679">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3680">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3681">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3682">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3684">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3685">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3686">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3687">eine Ziffer, die dem Geschlecht und dem Geburtsjahrhundert entspricht (ungerade Zahl männlich, sogar Zahl weiblich; 1-2: 19. Jahrhundert; 3-4: 20. Jahrhundert; 5.-6.: 21. Jahrhundert)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3688">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3689">drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen, die Personen trennt, die am selben Datum geboren wurden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3690">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3691">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3693">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3694">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3695">Die Funktion  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3696">Es wird ein  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3697">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3698">Die Funktion  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3731">Reisepassnummer für Estland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3733">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3734">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3735">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3736">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3737">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3738">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3739">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3740">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3741">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3742">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3743">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3744">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3745">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3763">EU-Debitkartennummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3765">16 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3766">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3767">Komplexes und robustes Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3768">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3769">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3770">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3771">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3772">Die Funktion Func_eu_debit_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3773">Mindestens eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3774">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_eu_debit_card wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3775">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3776">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_security_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3777">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3778">Die Funktion Func_expiration_date findet ein Datum im richtigen Datumsformat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-3779">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4226">Finnlands Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4228">10 Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4229">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4230">10 Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4231">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4232">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4233">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4234">Eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4235">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4236">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4237">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4238">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4239">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4240">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4371">Finnische Europäische Krankenversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4372">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4373">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4374">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4375">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4376">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4377">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4379">20-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4380">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4381">20-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4382">10 Ziffern – 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4383">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4384">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4385">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4386">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4387">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4388">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4389">Der regex-Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4390">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4408">Nationale ID Finnlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4410">sechs Ziffern plus ein Zeichen, das ein Jahrhundert plus drei Ziffern plus eine Prüfziffer angibt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4411">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4412">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4413">sechs Ziffern im Format DDMMYY, bei denen es sich um ein Geburtsdatum handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4414">Century Marker (entweder '-', '+' oder 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4415">dreistellige persönliche Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4416">Eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet), bei der es sich um eine Prüfziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4417">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4418">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4419">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4420">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4421">Die Funktion Func_finnish_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4422">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_finnish_national_id gefunden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4423">Die Prüfsummenprüfungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4424">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4425">Die Funktion Func_finnish_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4426">Die Prüfsummenprüfungen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4475">Finnland-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4476">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im Vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Passport Number verfügbar und steht als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4478">Kombination aus neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4479">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4480">Kombination aus neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4481">zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4482">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4483">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4484">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4485">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4486">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4487">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_finland_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4488">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4489">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4490">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4491">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_finland_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4492">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4515">Ablaufdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4515">date of expiry</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4516">Französische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4517">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Driver's License Number verfügbar und steht als eigenständige Entität für vertrauliche Informationen zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4519">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4520">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4521">12 Ziffern mit Validierung, um ähnliche Muster ( z. B. französische Telefonnummern) auszuschließen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4522">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4523">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4524">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4525">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4526">Die Funktion Func_french_drivers_license nach Inhalten sucht, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4527">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_french_drivers_license gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4654">Französische Krankenversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4655">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4656">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4657">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4658">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4659">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4660">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4662">21-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4663">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4664">21-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4665">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4666">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4667">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4668">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4669">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4670">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4671">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4672">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4673">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4674">Der regex-Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4675">ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4676">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4676">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4677">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4678">Versicherungskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4678">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4679">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4679">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4680">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4680">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4681">Französische nationale ID-Karte (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4683">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4684">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4685">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4686">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4687">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4688">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4689">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4690">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_france_cni findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4691">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4692">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4700">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4700">national identification number</span></span>
