## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4705">Französische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4706">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im Vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Passport Number verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4707">Es ist als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4709">neun Ziffern und Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4710">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4711">neun Ziffern und Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4712">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4713">zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4714">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4715">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4716">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4717">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4718">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4719">Die Funktion `Func_fr_passport` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4720">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4721">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date3` findet Datum im Format DD MM JJJJ oder ein Schlüsselwort aus gefunden `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4722">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4723">Die Funktion `Func_fr_passport` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4724">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4725">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4725">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4737">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4737">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4740">passeport non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4740">passeport non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4741">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4741">passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4742">passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4742">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4743">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4743">passeportnon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4744">passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4744">passeportn °</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4755">Französische Sozialversicherungsnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4757">15 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4758">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4759">Muss einem von zwei Mustern entsprechen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4760">13 Ziffern gefolgt von einem Leerzeichen gefolgt von zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4761">oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4762">15 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4763">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4764">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4765">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4766">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4767">Die Funktion `Func_french_insee` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4768">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_fr_insee wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4769">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4770">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4771">Die Funktion Func_french_insee oder Func_fr_insee findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4772">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4803">Französische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4805">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4806">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4807">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4808">Eine Ziffer, die 0, 1, 2 oder 3 sein muss</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4809">Eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4810">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4811">Zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4812">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4813">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4814">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4815">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4816">Ein Leerzeichen (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4817">Drei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4818">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4819">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4820">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4821">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4822">Die Funktion  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4823">Es wird ein  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4824">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4825">Die Funktion  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4827">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4827">Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4832">Steuer nein #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4832">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4837">taxdno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4837">taxidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4839">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4839">taxno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4841">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4841">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4842">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4842">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4843">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4843">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4844">tin #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4844">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4845">Französische Umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4846">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4847">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4848">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4849">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4850">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4851">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4853">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4854">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4855">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4856">zwei Buchstaben - FR (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4857">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4858">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4859">optionaler Leerzeichen, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4860">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4861">optionaler Leerzeichen, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4862">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4863">optionaler Leerzeichen, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4864">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4865">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4866">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4867">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4868">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4869">Die Funktion Func_france_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4870">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4871">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4872">Die Funktion Func_france_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4885">Deutsche Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4886">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Driver's License Number enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4887">Es ist als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4889">Kombination aus 11 Ziffern und Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4890">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4891">11 Ziffern und Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4892">Eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4893">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4894">sechs Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4895">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4896">Eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4897">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4898">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4899">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4900">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4901">Die Funktion Func_german_drivers_license findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4902">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_german_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-4903">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5052">Deutsche Identitätskartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5054">seit 1. November 2010: Neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5055">vom 1. April 1987 bis zum 31. Oktober 2010: 10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5056">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5057">seit dem 1. November 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5058">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5059">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5060">vom 1. April 1987 bis zum 31. Oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5061">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5062">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5063">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5064">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5065">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5066">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_germany_id_card, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5067">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_germany_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5068">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5068">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5073">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5073">identifikation</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5075">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5075">identity card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5083">Deutsche Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5084">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im Vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Passport Number enthalten und steht als eigenständige Entität für vertrauliche Informationen zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5086">10 Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5087">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5088">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5089">Das erste Zeichen ist eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe aus diesem Satz (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5090">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5091">fünf Ziffern oder Buchstaben aus diesem Satz (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5092">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5093">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5094">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5095">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5096">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5097">Die Funktion Func_german_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5098">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keyword_german_passport` oder `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5099">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5100">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5101">Die Funktion Func_german_passport_data findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5102">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keyword_german_passport` oder `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5103">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5126">Deutsche Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5128">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5129">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5130">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5131">Zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5132">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5133">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5134">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5135">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5136">Ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5137">Zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5138">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5139">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5140">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5141">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5142">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5143">Die Funktion  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5144">Es wird ein  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5145">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5146">Die Funktion  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5172">Deutsche Umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5173">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5174">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5175">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5176">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5177">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5178">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5180">11 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5181">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5182">Alphanumerisches 11-Zeichen-Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5183">Buchstabe D oder d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5184">ein Buchstabe E oder e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5185">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5186">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5187">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5188">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5189">ein optionales Leerzeichen oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5190">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5191">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5192">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5193">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5194">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5195">Die Funktion Func_germany_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5196">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5197">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5198">Die Funktion Func_germany_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5199">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5199">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5206">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5206">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5208">Führerscheinnummer für Griechenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5209">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp "EU Driver's License Number" enthalten und steht als eigenständige Entität für vertraulichen Informationstyp zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5211">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5212">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5213">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5214">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5215">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5216">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5217">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5218">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5219">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5345">Griechischer National-ID-Ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5347">Kombination von 7-8 Buchstaben und Zahlen plus einem Gedankenstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5348">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5349">Sieben Buchstaben und Zahlen (altes Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5350">Ein Buchstabe (jeder Buchstabe des griechischen Alphabets) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5351">Ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5352">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5353">Acht Buchstaben und Zahlen (neues Format):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5354">Zwei Buchstaben, deren Großbuchstabe sowohl im griechischen als auch lateinischen Alphabet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) vorkommt </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5355">Ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5356">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5357">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5358">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5359">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5360">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5361">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_greece_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5362">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_greece_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5363">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5364">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_greece_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5365">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5365">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5366">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5367">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5367">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5368">griechische nationale ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5368">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5369">griechische persönliche ID-Karte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5370">griechische Polizei-ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5370">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5371">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5371">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5372">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5372">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5373">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5373">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5374">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5374">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5375">Reisepassnummer für Griechenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5377">Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5378">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5379">Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5380">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5381">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5382">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5383">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5384">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5385">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5386">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY (Beispiel - 28.08.19), oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5387">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5388">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5389">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5390">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5392">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5392">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5393">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5393">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5394">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5394">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5395">Pässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5395">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5397">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5397">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5398">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5398">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5399">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5399">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5400">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5400">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5401">Reisepassnummern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5401">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5402">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5403">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5404">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5405">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5406">Griechenland Sozialversicherungsnummer (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5407">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5408">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5409">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5410">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5411">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5412">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5414">Elf Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5415">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5416">6 Ziffern als Geburtsdatum YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5417">4 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5418">Eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5419">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5420">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5421">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5422">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5423">Die Funktion  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5424">Es wird ein  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5425">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5426">Die Funktion  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5427">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5427">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5428">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5428">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5437">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Griechenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5438">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5439">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5440">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5441">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5442">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5443">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5445">Neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5446">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5447">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5448">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5449">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5450">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5451">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5452">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5453">Es wird ein  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5482">Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5484">Kombination aus 8-9Buchstaben und Zahlen sowie optionale Klammern um das letzte Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5485">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5486">Kombination aus Buchstaben 8-9 Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5487">1-2 Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5488">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5489">Das letzte Zeichen (eine Ziffer oder der Buchstabe A), bei dem es sich um die Prüfziffer handelt, die optional in Klammern eingeschlossen werden kann.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5490">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5491">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5492">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5493">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5494">Die Funktion Func_hong_kong_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5495">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_hong_kong_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5496">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5497">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5498">Die Funktion Func_hong_kong_id_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5499">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
