## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5539">Kennzeichen des Ungarn-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5541">Zwei Buchstaben, gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5542">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5543">Zwei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5544">Zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5545">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5546">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5547">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5548">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5549">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5550">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5551">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5676">Persönliche Identifikationsnummer für Ungarn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5677">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5678">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5679">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5680">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5681">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5682">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5684">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5685">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5686">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5687">Eine Ziffer, die dem Geschlecht entspricht (1-männlich, 2-weiblich, andere Nummern sind auch für Bürger möglich, die vor 1900 geboren sind, oder Bürger mit doppelter Staatsbürgerschaft)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5688">Sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5689">Drei Ziffern, die einer Seriennummer entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5690">Eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5691">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5692">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5693">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5694">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5695">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5696">Es wird ein  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5697">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5698">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5699">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5701">ID-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5701">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5702">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5702">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5703">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5703">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5704">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5704">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5705">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5705">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5706">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5706">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5708">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5708">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5709">Ungarn-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5710">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5711">Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs oder sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5712">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5713">Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs oder sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5714">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5715">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5716">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5717">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5718">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5719">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5720">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM JJ (Beispiel - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5721">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5722">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5723">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5743">Ungarn Sozialversicherungsnummer (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5745">Neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5746">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5747">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5748">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5749">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5750">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5751">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5752">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5753">Es wird ein  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5754">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5755">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5775">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Ungarn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5776">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5777">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5778">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5779">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5780">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5781">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5783">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5784">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5785">10 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5786">Eine Ziffer, die "8" sein muss</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5787">Acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5788">Eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5789">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5790">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5791">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5792">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5793">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5794">Es wird ein  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5795">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5796">Die Funktion  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5822">Mehrwertsteuernummer für Ungarn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5822">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5823">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5824">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5825">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5826">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5827">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5828">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5830">10 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5831">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5832">10 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5833">zwei Buchstaben - HU oder hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5834">optionaler Speicherplatz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5835">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5836">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5837">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5838">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5839">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5840">Die Funktion Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5841">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5842">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5843">Die Funktion Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5859">10 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5860">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5861">10 Buchstaben oder Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5862">Drei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5863">Ein Buchstabe in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5864">Ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5865">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5866">Ein Buchstabe, der eine alphabetische Prüfziffer ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5867">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5868">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5869">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5870">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5871">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_india_permanent_account_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5872">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_india_permanent_account_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5873">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5874">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_india_permanent_account_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5875">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5879">Indien eindeutige Identifikationsnummer (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5881">12 Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen oder Bindestrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5882">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5883">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5884">Eine Ziffer, die nicht 0 oder 1 ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5885">Drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5886">Eine optionales Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5887">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5888">Eine optionales Leerzeichen oder ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5889">Die letzte Ziffer, bei der es sich um die Prüfziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5890">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5891">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5892">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5893">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5894">Die Funktion Func_india_aadhaar findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5895">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_india_aadhar gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5896">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5897">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5898">Die Funktion Func_india_aadhaar findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5899">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5908">Indonesische Identitätskarte (KTP)-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5910">16 Ziffern mit optionalen Punkten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5911">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5912">16 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5913">Zweistelliger Provinzcode </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5914">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5915">Zweistelliger Regency- oder Stadtcode </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5916">Zweistelliger Subdistrict-Code </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5917">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5918">Sechs Ziffern im Format DDMMYY, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5919">Ein Punkt (optional) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5920">Vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5921">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5922">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5923">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5924">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5925">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_indonesia_id_card, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5926">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_indonesia_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5927">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5927">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5930">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5930">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5932">Internationale Bankkontonummer (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5934">Ländercode (zwei Buchstaben) plus Prüfziffern (zwei Ziffern) plus Bban-Zahl (bis zu 30 Zeichen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5935">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5936">Das Muster muss Folgendes enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5937">Zwei-Buchstaben-Ländercode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5938">Zwei Prüfziffern (gefolgt von einem optionalen Leerzeichen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5939">1-7 Gruppen mit vier Buchstaben oder Ziffern (können durch Leerzeichen getrennt werden)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5940">1 bis 3 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5941">Das Format für jedes Land ist geringfügig unterschiedlich.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5941">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5942">Der Typ vertraulicher IBAN-Informationen deckt die folgenden 60 Länder ab:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5942">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk , sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5944">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5946">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5947">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5948">Die Funktion Func_iban findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5949">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5950">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5951">Keiner</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5952">Internationale Klassifikation von Erkrankungen (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5954">Wörterbuch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5955">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5956">Schlüsselwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5957">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5958">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5959">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5960">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5961">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_10_updated gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5962">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_10_codes gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5963">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5970">Internationale Klassifikation von Erkrankungen (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5970">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5971">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5973">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5974">Schlüsselwort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5974">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5975">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5976">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5977">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5978">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5979">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_9_updated gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5980">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_9_codes gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5981">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5982">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Dictionary_icd_9_updated gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5983">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5983">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5984">Ein beliebiger Ausdruck aus Dictionary_icd_9_updated Schlüsselwortwörterbuch, das auf der Internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheit, neunter Revision, klinischer Änderung [(ICD-9-CM) basiert.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5984">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5985">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach dem Ausdruck, nicht nach den Versicherungscodes.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5985">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5986">Jeder Ausdruck aus dem Dictionary_icd_9_codes Schlüsselwortwörterbuch, das auf der Internationalen Klassifikation von Krankheit, neunter Revision, klinischer Änderung [(ICD-9-CM) basiert.](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5987">Dieser Typ sucht nur nach Versicherungscodes, nicht nach der Beschreibung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5987">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5988">IP-Adresse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5990">IPv4:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5991">Komplexes Muster, das formatierte (Perioden) und unformatierte (keine Zeiträume) Versionen der IPv4-Adressen verwendet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5992">IPv6:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5993">Komplexes Muster, das formatierte IPv6-Zahlen (die Doppelpunkte enthalten)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5994">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5995">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5996">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5997">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5998">Für IPv6 hat eine DLP-Richtlinie eine hohe Sicherheit, dass diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt wird, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-5999">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv6_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6000">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6001">Für IPv4 hat eine DLP-Richtlinie hohe Vertrauen, dass diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt wird, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6002">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv4_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6003">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6004">Für IPv6 hat eine DLP-Richtlinie eine hohe Sicherheit, dass diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt wird, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6005">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_ipv6_address findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6006">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ipaddress gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6007">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6009">IP (bei diesem Schlüsselwort wird die Zwischen-/Kleinschreibung beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6009">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6010">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6010">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6011">IP-Adressen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6011">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6012">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6012">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6014">Führerscheinnummer des Irland-Treibers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6016">Sechs Ziffern, gefolgt von vier Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6017">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6018">Sechs Ziffern und vier Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6019">Sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6020">Vier Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6021">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6022">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6023">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6024">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6025">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6026">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6148">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6148">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6149">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6149">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6150">Irland Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6152">Zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6153">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6154">Zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6155">Zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6156">Sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6157">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6158">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6159">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6160">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6161">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6162">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6163">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Beispiel - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) oder ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6164">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6165">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6166">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6190">Nummer des öffentlichen Dienstes (Personal Public Service, PPS) in Irland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6192">Altes Format (bis 31. Dezember 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6193">sieben Ziffern gefolgt von 1-2 Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6194">Neues Format (1. Januar 2013 und danach):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6195">sieben Ziffern gefolgt von zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6196">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6197">Altes Format (bis 31. Dezember 2012):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6198">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6199">ein bis zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6200">Neues Format (1. Januar 2013 und danach):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6201">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6202">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall), bei dem es sich um eine alphabetische Prüfziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6203">Ein optionaler Buchstabe im Bereich A-I oder "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6204">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6205">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6206">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6207">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6208">Die Funktion Func_ireland_pps findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6209">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6210">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6211">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6212">Die Funktion Func_ireland_pps findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6213">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
