## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6258">Kontonummer für Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6260">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6261">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6262">Formatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6263">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6264">ein Strich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6265">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6266">ein Strich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6267">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6268">Unformatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6269">	13 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6270">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6271">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6272">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6273">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6274">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_israel_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6275">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_israel_bank_account_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6276">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6276">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6278">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6278">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6279">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6279">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6280">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6280">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6282">Nationale Identifikationsnummer Für Israel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6284">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6285">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6286">neun aufeinander folgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6287">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6288">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6289">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6290">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6291">Die Funktion Func_israeli_national_id_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6292">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Israel_National_ID wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6293">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6312">Italienische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6313">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp "EU Driver's License Number" enthalten und steht als eigenständige Entität für vertraulichen Informationstyp zur Verfügung.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6314">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6315">eine Kombination aus 10 Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6316">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6317">eine Kombination aus 10 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6318">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6319">Der Buchstabe "A" oder "V" (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6320">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6321">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6322">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6323">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6324">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6325">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6326">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6327">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6454">Steuercode für Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6455">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6456">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6457">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6458">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6459">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6460">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6462">eine 16-stellige Kombination aus Buchstaben und Ziffern im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6463">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6464">Eine 16-stellige Kombination aus Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6465">drei Buchstaben, die den ersten drei Konsonanten im Familiennamen entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6466">drei Buchstaben, die dem ersten, dritten und vierten Konsonanten im Vornamen entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6467">zwei Ziffern, die den letzten Ziffern des Geburtsjahres entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6468">ein Buchstabe, der dem Buchstaben für den Monat der Geburt entspricht– Buchstaben werden in alphabetischer Reihenfolge verwendet, aber nur die Buchstaben A bis E, H, L, M, P, R bis T werden verwendet (also ist Januar A und Oktober ist R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6469">zwei Ziffern, die dem Tag des Geburtsmonats entsprechen– um zwischen den Geschlechten zu unterscheiden, wird 40 zum Tag der Geburt für Frauen hinzugefügt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6470">vier Ziffern, die der ortsspezifischen Vorwahl für die Kommune entsprechen, in der die Person geboren wurde (länderweite Codes werden für fremde Länder verwendet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6471">eine Paritätsziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6472">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6473">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6474">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6475">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6476">Die Funktion  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6477">Es wird ein  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6478">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6479">Die Funktion  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6514">Italienische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6516">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6517">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6518">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6519">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6520">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6521">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6522">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6523">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6524">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6525">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6526">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6527">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Beispiel - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6528">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6529">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6530">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6554">Mehrwertsteuernummer für Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6555">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6556">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6557">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6558">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6559">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6560">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6562">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6563">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6564">13 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster mit optionalen Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6565">I oder i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6566">T oder t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6567">optionaler Abstand, Punkt, Bindestrich oder Komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6568">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6569">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6570">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6571">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6572">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6573">Die Funktion Func_italy_value_added_tax_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6574">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6575">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6576">Die Funktion Func_italy_value_added_tax_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6584">Japanische Bankkontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6586">sieben oder acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6587">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6588">Bankkontonummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6589">sieben oder acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6590">Bankkonto-Filialcode:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6591">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6592">Leerzeichen oder Strich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6593">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6594">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6595">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6596">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6597">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6598">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6599">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6600">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6601">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6602">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6603">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6604">Die Funktion Func_jp_bank_account findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6605">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_bank_account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6652">Japanische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6654">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6655">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6656">12 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6657">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6658">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6659">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6660">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6661">Die Funktion Func_jp_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6662">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6662">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6700">Japan My Number – Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6701">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6702">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6703">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6704">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6705">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6706">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6707">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6708">13-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6709">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6710">13-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6711">eine Ziffer von 1 bis 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6712">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6713">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6714">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6715">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6716">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6717">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_corporate nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6718">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6719">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6720">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_corporate nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6734">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6734">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6735">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6735">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6736">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6736">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6737">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6737">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6738">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6738">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6739">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6739">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6740">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6741">12-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6741">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6742">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6743">12-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6743">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6744">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6744">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6745">optionaler Leerzeichen, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6745">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6746">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6746">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6747">optionaler Leerzeichen, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6748">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6748">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6749">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6750">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6751">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6752">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6752">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6753">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_personal findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6753">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6754">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6754">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6755">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6756">Die Funktion Func_japanese_my_number_personal findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6756">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6764">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6766">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6766">個人識別番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6769">Japanische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6771">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6772">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6773">zwei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6774">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6775">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6776">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6777">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6778">Die Funktion Func_jp_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6779">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_passport wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6796">Japanische Wohnsitzkartennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6798">12 Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6799">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6800">12 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6801">zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6802">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6803">zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6804">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6805">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6806">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6807">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6808">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_jp_residence_card_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6809">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_residence_card_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6810">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6810">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6811">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6811">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6812">Nummer der Aufenthaltskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6812">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6813">Aufenthaltskarte nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6813">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6814">Aufenthaltskarte #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6814">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6815">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6815">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6816">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6816">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6817">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6817">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6818">In Japan ansässige Registrierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6820">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6820">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6821">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6822">11 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6823">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6824">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6824">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6825">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6826">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6827">Die Funktion Func_jp_resident_registration_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6828">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6829">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6829">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6830">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6830">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6831">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6831">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6832">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6832">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6833">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6833">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6834">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6834">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6835">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6836">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6836">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6837">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6838">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6838">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6839">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6839">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6840">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6840">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6841">Japanische Sozialversicherungsnummer (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6843">7-12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6844">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6845">7 bis 12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6846">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6847">ein Bindestrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6848">sechs Ziffern OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6849">7-12 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6850">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6851">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6852">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6853">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6854">Die Funktion Func_jp_sin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6855">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6856">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6857">Die Funktion Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6858">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_jp_sin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6879">Lizenznummer des Lettland-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6881">drei Buchstaben gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6882">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6883">drei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6884">drei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6885">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6886">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6887">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6888">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6889">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6890">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-6891">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7016">Persönlicher Code für Lettland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7018">11 Ziffern und ein optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7019">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7020">Altes Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7021">11 Ziffern und ein Bindestrich:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7022">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7023">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7024">eine Ziffer, die dem Geburtsjahrhundert ("0" für das 19. Jahrhundert, "1" für das 20. Und "2" für das 21. Jahrhundert) entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7025">vier Ziffern, nach dem Zufallsprinzip generiert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7026">Neues Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7027">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7028">Zwei Ziffern "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7029">Neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7030">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7031">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7032">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7033">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7034">Die Funktion  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` oder der regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7035">Es wird ein  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7036">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7037">Die Funktion  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` oder der regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7100">Reisepassnummer für Lettland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7102">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7103">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7104">zwei Buchstaben oder Ziffern gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7105">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7106">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7107">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7108">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7109">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7110">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7111">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7112">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7113">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7114">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7115">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7116">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7139">Lizenznummer des Litauen-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7141">acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7142">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7143">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7144">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7145">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7146">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7147">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7148">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7149">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
