## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7274">Persönlichen Code für Litauen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7275">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7276">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7277">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7278">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7279">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7280">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7282">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7283">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7284">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7285">eine Ziffer (1-6), die dem Geschlecht und dem Geburtsdatum der Person entspricht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7286">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7287">drei Ziffern, die der Seriennummer des Geburtsdatums entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7288">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7289">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7290">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7291">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7292">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7293">Die Funktion  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7294">Es wird ein  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7295">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7296">Die Funktion  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7331">Reisepassnummer für Litauen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7333">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7334">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7335">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7336">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7337">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7338">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7339">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7340">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7341">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7342">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date3` findet Datum im Format DD MM JJJJ oder ein Schlüsselwort aus gefunden `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7343">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7344">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7345">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7365">Luxemburger Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7367">sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7368">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7369">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7370">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7371">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7372">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7373">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7374">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7375">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7499">Nationale Luxemburger Identifikationsnummer (natürliche Personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7500">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7501">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7502">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7503">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7504">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7505">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7507">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7508">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7509">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7510">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7511">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7512">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7513">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7514">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7515">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7516">Die Funktion  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7517">Es wird ein  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7518">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7519">Die Funktion  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7542">Luxemburger Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7544">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7545">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7546">acht Ziffern oder Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7547">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7548">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7549">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7550">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7551">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7552">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7553">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date3` findet Datum im Format DD MM JJJJ oder ein Schlüsselwort aus gefunden `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7554">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7555">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7556">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7588">Nationale Luxemburger Identifikationsnummer (nicht natürliche Personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7589">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7590">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7591">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7592">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7593">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7594">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7595">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7596">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7597">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7598">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7599">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7600">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7601">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7602">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7603">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7604">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7605">Die Funktion  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7606">Es wird ein  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7607">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7608">Die Funktion  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7648">Nummer der Malaysia-Identifikationskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7650">12 Ziffern mit optionalen Bindestrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7651">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7652">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7653">sechs Ziffern im Format YYMMDD, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7654">ein Strich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7655">Zwei-Buchstaben-Geburtsortcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7656">ein Strich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7657">drei zufällige Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7658">einstelliger Gendercode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7659">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7660">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7661">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7662">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7663">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_malaysia_id_card_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7664">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7691">Führerscheinnummer des Malta-Treibers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7693">Kombination aus zwei Zeichen und sechs Ziffern im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7694">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7695">Kombination aus zwei Zeichen und sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7696">zwei Zeichen (Ziffern oder Buchstaben, keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7697">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7698">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7699">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7700">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7701">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7702">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7703">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7704">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7705">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7706">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7830">Nummer des Malta-Identitätskarten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7831">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7832">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7833">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7834">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7835">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7836">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7838">sieben Ziffern gefolgt von einem Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7839">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7840">sieben Ziffern gefolgt von einem Buchstaben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7841">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7842">ein Buchstabe in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7843">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7844">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7845">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7846">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7847">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7848">Es wird ein  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7849">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7850">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7867">Malta-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7869">sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7870">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7871">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7872">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7873">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7874">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7875">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7876">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7877">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7878">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7879">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7880">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7881">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7901">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7903">Für maltesische Staatsangehörige:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7904">sieben Ziffern und ein Buchstabe im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7905">Nicht-maltesische Staatsangehörige und maltesische Entitäten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7906">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7907">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7908">Maltesische Staatsangehörige: sieben Ziffern und ein Buchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7909">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7910">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7911">Nicht-maltesische Staatsangehörige und maltesische Entitäten: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7912">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7913">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7914">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7915">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7916">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7917">Der regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  oder `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7918">Es wird ein  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7919">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7920">Der regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7930">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7930">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7953">Medicare-Empfänger-ID (MBI)-Karte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7954">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7955">alphanumerisches Muster mit elf Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7956">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7957">eine Ziffer zwischen 1 und 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7958">ein Buchstabe ohne S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7959">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe ohne S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7960">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7961">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7962">ein Buchstabe ohne S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7963">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe ohne S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7964">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7965">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7966">zwei Buchstaben ohne S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7967">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7968">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7969">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7970">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7971">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7972">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_mbi_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7973">Es wird ein  `Keyword_mbi_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7974">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7975">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_mbi_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7976">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7976">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7987">18 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7988">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7989">vier Buchstaben (Groß-/Kleinschreibung nicht beachtet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7990">sechs Ziffern, die ein gültiges Datum angeben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7991">ein Buchstabe – H/h oder M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7992">zwei Buchstaben, die einen gültigen code für den Bundesstaat Mexiko angeben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7993">drei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7994">ein Buchstabe oder eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7995">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7996">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7997">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7998">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-7999">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8000">Die Funktion  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8001">Es wird ein  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8002">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8003">Die Funktion  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8011">Persönliche ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8011">Personal ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8015">uniqueidkey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8015">uniqueidkey</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8024">Nummer des niederländischen Bürgerdiensts (BSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8026">acht oder neun Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8027">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8028">89 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8029">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8030">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8031">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8032">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8033">zwei-drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8034">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8035">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8036">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8037">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8038">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_bsn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8039">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_netherlands_bsn gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8040">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8064">Niederländische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8066">zehn Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8067">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8068">zehn Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8069">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8070">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8071">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8072">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8073">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8074">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8075">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8075">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8076">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8076">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8077">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8077">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8078">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8078">driverlics</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8080">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8080">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8081">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8081">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8082">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8082">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8083">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8083">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8084">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8084">driver lics</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8202">Niederländische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8204">neun Buchstaben oder Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8205">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8206">neun Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8207">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8208">nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8209">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8210">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8211">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8212">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8213">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Beispiel - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8214">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8215">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8216">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8234">Niederländische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8235">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8236">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8237">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8238">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8239">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8240">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8242">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8243">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8244">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8245">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8246">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8247">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8248">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8249">Die Funktion  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8250">Es wird ein  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8251">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8252">Die Funktion  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
