## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8290">Niederländische Umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8291">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8292">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8293">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8294">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8295">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8296">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8297">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8298">14 Zeichen alphanumerisches Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8299">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8300">Alphanumerisches 14-Zeichen-Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8301">N oder n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8302">L oder l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8303">optionaler Abstand, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8304">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8305">optionaler Abstand, Punkt oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8306">B oder b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8307">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8308">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8309">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8310">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8311">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8312">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8313">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8314">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8315">Die Funktion Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8324">Bankkontonummer für Neuseeland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8324">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8325">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8326">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8327">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8328">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8328">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8329">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8330">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8332">14-stelliges bis 16-stelliges Muster mit optionalem Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8333">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8334">14-stelliges bis 16-stelliges Muster mit optionalem Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8335">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8336">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8337">drei bis vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8338">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8339">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8340">optionaler Bindestrich oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8341">zwei bis drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8341">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8342">Ein Optionsbindestrich oder -leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8342">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8343">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8344">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8345">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8346">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8347">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8348">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8349">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8350">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8358">Führerscheinnummer des neuseeländischen Treibers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8358">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8359">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8360">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8361">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8362">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8363">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8364">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8366">alphanumerisches Muster mit acht Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8366">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8367">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8368">alphanumerisches Muster mit acht Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8368">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8369">zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8369">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8370">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8370">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8371">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8372">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8373">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8374">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8374">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8375">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_driver_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8375">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8376">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8376">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8377">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8377">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8378">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_driver_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8378">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8446">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8447">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8447">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8448">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8448">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8449">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8449">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8450">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8450">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8451">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8451">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8453">acht oder neun Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8453">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8454">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8455">acht oder neun Ziffern mit optionalen Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8455">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8456">zwei oder drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8456">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8457">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8457">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8458">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8458">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8459">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8460">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8461">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8462">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8463">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8464">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8465">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8466">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8467">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8468">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8477">Nummer des neuseeländischen Gesundheitsministeriums</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8479">drei Buchstaben, ein Leerzeichen (optional) und vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8480">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8481">drei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung) mit Ausnahme von "I" und "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8482">ein Leerzeichen (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8483">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8484">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8485">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8486">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8487">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8488">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8489">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_nz_terms wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8490">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8491">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8492">Die Funktion Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8493">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8507">Neuseeländische Nummer für soziales Wohl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8507">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8508">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8509">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8510">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8511">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8512">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8513">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8515">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8515">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8516">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8517">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8518">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8519">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8520">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8521">optionaler Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8522">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8523">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8524">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8525">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8526">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8527">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8528">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8529">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8530">Die Funktion Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8531">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8533">Soziales Wohl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8533">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8534">Soziales Wohl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8534">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8535">Soziales Wohl nein.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8535">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8536">Social Social Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8536">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8537">swn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8537">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8538">Norwegen-Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8540">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8541">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8542">11 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8543">sechs Ziffern im Format DDMMYY, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8544">dreistellige einzelzahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8545">zwei Prüfziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8546">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8547">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8548">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8549">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8550">Die Funktion Func_norway_id_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8551">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_norway_id_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8552">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8553">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8554">Die Funktion Func_norway_id_numbe nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8555">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8558">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8558">Personal identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8560">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8560">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8561">Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8561">Identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8563">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8563">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8564">Einheitliche mehrzweckige Identifikationsnummer für Die Philippinen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8566">12 Ziffern, durch Bindestriche getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8567">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8568">12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8569">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8570">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8571">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8572">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8573">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8574">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8575">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8576">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8577">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8578">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_philippines_unified_id, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8579">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_philippines_id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8580">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8584">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8586">Polnische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8588">14 Ziffern mit zwei Schrägstrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8589">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8590">14 Ziffern und zwei Schrägstriche:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8591">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8592">ein Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8593">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8594">ein Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8595">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8596">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8597">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8598">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8599">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8600">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8601">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8725">Polen-Identitätskarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8727">drei Buchstaben und sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8728">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8729">drei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), gefolgt von sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8730">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8732">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8733">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8734">Die Funktion Func_polish_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8735">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8736">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8737">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8737">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8747">Nationale POLNISCHE ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8749">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8750">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8751">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum im Format "YYMMDD" darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8752">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8753">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8754">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8755">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8756">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8757">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8758">Die Funktion Func_pesel_identification_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8759">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_pesel_identification_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8760">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8761">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8762">Die Funktion Func_pesel_identification_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8763">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8764">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8764">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8765">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8765">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8766">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8766">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8767">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8767">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8769">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8769">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8775">Polnische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8776">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im Vertraulichen Informationstyp EU Passport Number enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8777">Es ist als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8779">zwei Buchstaben und sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8780">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8781">Zwei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8782">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8783">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8784">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8785">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8786">Die Funktion `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8787">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8788">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8789">Es wird ein `Keywords_eu_passport_date` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8790">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8791">Die Funktion `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8792">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8793">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8794">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8795">Die Funktion `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8796">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8822">Polen REGON-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8823">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8824">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8825">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8826">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8827">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8828">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8830">9-stellige oder 14-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8831">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8832">neun Ziffern oder 14 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8833">neun Ziffern oder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8834">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8835">Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8836">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8837">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8838">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8839">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8840">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8841">Die Funktion Func_polish_regon_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8842">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_polish_regon_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8843">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8844">Die Funktion Func_polish_regon_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8861">Polnische Steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8862">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8863">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8864">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8865">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8866">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8867">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8869">11 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8870">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8871">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8872">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8873">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8874">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8875">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8876">Die Funktion  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8877">Es wird ein  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8907">Nummer der Portugiesischen Bürgerkarte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8909">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8910">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8911">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8912">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8913">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8914">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8915">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8916">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_portugal_citizen_card findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8917">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_portugal_citizen_card gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8937">Führerscheinnummer für Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8939">zwei Muster – zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von 5-8 Ziffern mit Sonderzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8940">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8941">Muster 1: Zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von 5/6 mit Sonderzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8942">Zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8943">Ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8944">Fünf oder sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8945">Ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8946">Eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8947">Muster 2: Ein Buchstabe gefolgt von 6/8 Ziffern mit Sonderzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8948">Ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8949">Ein Bindestrich </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8950">Sechs oder acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8951">Ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8952">Eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8953">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8954">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8955">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8956">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8957">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-8958">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9090">Portugal-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9092">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sechs Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9093">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9094">ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sechs Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9095">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9096">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9097">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9098">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9099">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9100">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9101">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9102">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9103">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9104">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9105">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9106">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
