## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9133">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9135">neun Ziffern mit optionalen Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9136">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9137">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9138">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9139">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9140">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9141">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9142">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9143">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9144">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9145">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9146">Die Funktion  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9147">Es wird ein  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9148">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9149">Die Funktion  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9174">Kennzeichen des Rumänien-Führerscheins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9176">ein Zeichen gefolgt von acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9177">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9178">ein Zeichen gefolgt von acht Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9179">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall) oder Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9180">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9181">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9182">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9183">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9184">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9185">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9186">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9314">Rumänien – persönlicher numerischer Code (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9315">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9316">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9317">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9318">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9319">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9320">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9322">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9323">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9324">eine Ziffer zwischen 1 und 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9325">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9326">zwei Ziffern, die 01-52 oder 99 sein können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9327">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9328">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9329">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9330">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9331">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9332">Die Funktion  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9333">Es wird ein  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9334">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9335">Die Funktion  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9386">Rumänien-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9388">acht oder neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9389">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9390">acht oder neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9391">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9392">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9393">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9394">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9395">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9396">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9397">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet Datum im Format `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Beispiel- 01 FEB/FEB 10) oder ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden wird.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9398">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9399">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9400">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9418">Russische Reisepassnummer inland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9418">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9419">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9420">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9421">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9422">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9423">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9424">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9426">10-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9427">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9428">10-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9429">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9430">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9431">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9432">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9433">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9433">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9434">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9435">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9436">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9437">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9438">Der regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9439">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9439">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9456">Russische Reisepassnummer international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9456">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9457">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9458">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9459">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9460">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9461">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9462">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9463">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9464">neunstellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9464">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9465">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9466">neunstellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9466">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9467">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9467">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9468">optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9468">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9469">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9469">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9470">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9471">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9471">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9472">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9472">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9473">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9474">Der regex-Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9475">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9492">Saudi-Arabische Ausweisnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9494">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9495">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9496">10 aufeinanderfolgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9497">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9498">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9499">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9500">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9501">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9502">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9503">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9503">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9509">Nummer des nationalen Registrierungsidentitätsausweises (NRIC) in Singapur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9511">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9512">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9513">neun Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9514">Der Buchstabe "F", "G", "S" oder "T" (nicht zwischen Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9515">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9516">eine alphabetische Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9517">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9520">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9521">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_singapore_nric nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9522">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_singapore_nric gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9523">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9524">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9525">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_singapore_nric nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9526">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9527">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9527">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9528">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9528">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9531">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9531">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9532">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9532">IC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9535">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9535">身份证</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9537">Führerscheinnummer des Slowaken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9539">ein Zeichen gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9540">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9541">ein Zeichen gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9542">ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall) oder Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9543">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9544">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9545">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9546">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9547">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9548">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9549">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9550">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9550">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9551">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9551">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9552">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9552">driverlic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9556">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9556">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9557">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9557">driverlicences</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9558">driver lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9558">driver lic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9559">driver lics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9559">driver lics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9560">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9560">driver license</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9675">Persönliche Nummer der Slowakei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9676">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9677">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9678">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9679">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9680">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9681">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9683">neun oder zehn Ziffern mit optionalem umgekehrtem Schrägstrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9684">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9685">sechs Ziffern, die das Geburtsdatum darstellen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9686">optionaler Schrägstrich (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9687">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9688">eine optionale Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9689">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9690">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9691">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9692">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9693">Die Funktion  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9694">Es wird ein  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9695">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9696">Die Funktion  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9743">Reisepassnummer der Slowakei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9745">eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9746">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9747">Eine Ziffer oder ein Buchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall) gefolgt von sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9748">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9749">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9750">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9751">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9752">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9753">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9754">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9755">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9756">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9757">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9779">Führerscheinnummer des Slowenen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9781">neun Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9782">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9783">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9784">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9785">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9786">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9787">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9788">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9789">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9790">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9790">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9791">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9791">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9923">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9924">13 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9925">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9926">13 Ziffern im angegebenen Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9927">sieben Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum (DDMMLLL) entsprechen, wobei "LLL" den letzten drei Ziffern des Geburtsjahres entspricht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9928">zwei Ziffern, die dem Geburtsbereich "50" entsprechen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9929">drei Ziffern, die einer Kombination aus Geschlecht und Seriennummer für Personen entsprechen, die am selben Tag geboren wurden (000-499 für männlich und 500-999 für frauen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9930">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9931">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9932">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9933">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9934">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9935">Die Funktion  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9936">Es wird ein  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9937">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9938">Die Funktion  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9966">Slowenien-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9968">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9969">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9970">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von sieben Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9971">der Buchstabe "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9972">ein Großbuchstabe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9973">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9974">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9975">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9976">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9977">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9978">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9979">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9980">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_eu_passport_date1` findet Datum im Format DD.MM.YYYY, oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9981">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9982">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9983">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-9997">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-9997">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10006">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Slowenien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10007">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10008">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10009">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10010">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10011">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10012">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10014">Acht Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10015">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10016">eine Ziffer zwischen 1 und 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10017">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10018">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10019">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10020">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10021">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10022">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10023">Die Funktion  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10024">Es wird ein  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10025">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10026">Die Funktion  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
