## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10050">Südafrika-Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10052">13 Ziffern, die Leerzeichen enthalten können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10053">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10054">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10055">sechs Ziffern im Format YYMMDD, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10056">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10057">ein einstelliger Staatsbürgerschaftsindikator</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10058">die Ziffer "8" oder "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10059">eine Ziffer, bei der es sich um eine Prüfsummenziffer handelt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10060">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10061">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10062">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10063">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10064">Die Funktion Func_south_africa_identification_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10065">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_south_africa_identification_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10066">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10067">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10067">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10069">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10069">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10070">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10070">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10071">Identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10071">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10072">In Südkorea ansässige Registrierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10074">13 Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10075">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10076">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10077">sechs Ziffern im Format YYMMDD, die das Geburtsdatum sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10078">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10079">eine Ziffer, die durch das Jahrhundert und das Geschlecht bestimmt wird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10080">Vierstelliger Geburtsregionscode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10081">Eine Ziffer, die verwendet wird, um Personen zu unterscheiden, für die die vorherigen Zahlen identisch sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10082">eine Prüfziffer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10083">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10084">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10085">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10086">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10087">Die Funktion Func_south_korea_resident_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10088">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_south_korea_resident_number gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10089">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10090">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10091">Die Funktion Func_south_korea_resident_number nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10092">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10093">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10093">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10095">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10095">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10096">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10096">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10098">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10098">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10099">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10099">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10100">Spanische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10102">acht Ziffern gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10103">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10104">acht Ziffern gefolgt von einem Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10105">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10106">eine Ziffer oder einen Buchstaben (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10107">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10108">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10109">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10110">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10111">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10112">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10113">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10114">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10115">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10115">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10116">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10116">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10117">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10117">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10118">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10118">driverlics</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10254">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10256">acht Ziffern gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10257">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10258">sieben Ziffern gefolgt von einem Zeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10259">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10260">Optionaler Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10261">ein Prüfbuchstabe (ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10262">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10263">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10264">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10265">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10266">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10267">Es wird ein  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10268">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10269">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10293">Spanische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10295">eine Acht- oder Neunzeichenkombination aus Buchstaben und Zahlen ohne Leerzeichen oder Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10296">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10297">eine Acht- oder Neun-Zeichen-Kombination aus Buchstaben und Zahlen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10298">zwei Ziffern oder Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10299">eine Ziffer oder einen Buchstaben (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10300">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10301">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10302">Nicht zutreffend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10303">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10304">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10305">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10306">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10307">Der reguläre Ausdruck `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` findet Datum im Format DD-MM-YYYY oder ein Schlüsselwort wird `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10308">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10309">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10310">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10311">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10311">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10339">Spanien Sozialversicherungsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10341">11-12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10342">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10343">11-12 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10344">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10345">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10346">sieben bis acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10347">Schrägstrich (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10348">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10349">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10350">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10351">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10352">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10353">Die Funktion Func_spanish_social_security_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10354">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10355">Es wird ein  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10356">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10357">Die Funktion Func_spanish_social_security_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10358">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10367">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Spanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10368">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10369">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10370">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10371">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10372">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10373">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10375">sieben oder acht Ziffern und ein oder zwei Buchstaben im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10376">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10377">Spanische natürliche Personen mit einem nationalen Personalausweis Spaniens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10378">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10379">ein Großbuchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10380">Gebietsansässige Spaniards ohne nationalen Personalausweis spaniens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10381">ein Großbuchstabe "L" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10382">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10383">ein Großbuchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10384">Gebietsansässige Spaniards unter 14 Jahren ohne nationalen Personalausweis Spaniens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10385">ein Großbuchstabe "K" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10386">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10387">ein Großbuchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10388">Fremden mit der Identifikationsnummer eines Fremden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10389">ein Großbuchstabe, der "X", "Y" oder "Z" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung) ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10390">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10391">ein Großbuchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10392">Fremde ohne Identifikationsnummer eines Fremden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10393">ein Großbuchstabe mit dem Buchstaben "M" (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10394">sieben Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10395">ein Großbuchstabe (Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10396">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10397">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10398">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10399">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10400">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10401">Es wird ein  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10402">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10403">Die Funktion  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` oder `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10434">SQL Server Verbindungszeichenfolge</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10436">Die Zeichenfolge "User ID", "User ID", "uid" oder "UserId" gefolgt von den Zeichen und Zeichenfolgen im folgenden Muster.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10437">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10438">die Zeichenfolge "User ID", "User ID", "uid" oder "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10439">beliebige Kombination aus 1-200 Klein- oder Großbuchstaben, Ziffern, Symbolen, Sonderzeichen oder Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10440">die Zeichenfolge "Password" oder "pwd", wobei "pwd" nicht vor einem Kleinbuchstaben steht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10441">ein Gleichheitszeichen (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10442">jedes Zeichen, das kein Dollarzeichen ($), ein Prozentsymbol (%), größer als Symbol (>), bei Symbol (@), Anführungszeichen ("), Semikolon (;), linke geschweifte Klammer([) oder linke Klammer ({) ist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10443">beliebige Kombination aus 7 bis 128 Zeichen, die kein Semikolon (;), Schrägstrich (/) oder Anführungszeichen (") sind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10444">ein Semikolon (;) oder Anführungszeichen (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10445">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10446">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10447">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10448">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10449">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10450">Ein Schlüsselwort aus CEP_GlobalFilter nicht gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10451">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10452">Der reguläre Ausdruck CEP_CommonExampleKeywords findet keinen Inhalt, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10480">Schwedische Führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10482">zehn Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10483">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10484">zehn Ziffern, die einen Bindestrich enthalten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10485">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10486">ein Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10487">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10488">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10489">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10490">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10491">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10492">Der reguläre Ausdruck  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10493">Ein Schlüsselwort aus  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` oder `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10626">Nationale SCHWEDISCHE ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10628">10 oder 12 Ziffern und ein optionales Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10629">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10630">10 oder 12 Ziffern und ein optionals Trennzeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10631">zwei Ziffern (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10632">Sechs Ziffern im Datumsformat JJMMTT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10633">Trennzeichen von "-" oder "+" (optional)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10634">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10635">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10636">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10637">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10638">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10639">Die Funktion `Func_swedish_national_identifier` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10640">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10641">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10642">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10643">Die Funktion `Func_swedish_national_identifier` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10644">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10663">Schwedische Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10665">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10666">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10667">Acht aufeinander folgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10668">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10669">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10670">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10671">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10672">der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_sweden_passport_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10673">ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_sweden_passport` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10674">Der reguläre Ausdruck findet ein Datum im Format `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM JJ (01 JAN/JAN 12), oder es wird ein Schlüsselwort `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10675">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10676">der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_sweden_passport_number, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10677">ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keyword_sweden_passport` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10678">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10678">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10713">Steueridentifikationsnummer für Schweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10714">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10715">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10716">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10717">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10718">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10719">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10721">10 Ziffern und ein Symbol im angegebenen Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10722">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10723">10 Ziffern und ein Symbol:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10724">sechs Ziffern, die dem Geburtsdatum entsprechen (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10725">ein Plus- oder Minuszeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10726">drei Ziffern, die die Identifikationsnummer eindeutig machen, wobei:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10727">für Vor 1990 ausgegebene Nummern geben die siebte und die achte Ziffer den Geburtslandkreis oder die fremd geborenen Personen an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10728">die Ziffer an der neunten Position gibt das Geschlecht entweder ungerade für männlich oder sogar für weiblich an.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10729">eine Prüfziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10730">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10731">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10732">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10733">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10734">Die Funktion  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10735">Es wird ein  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10736">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10737">Die Funktion  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10763">SWIFT-Codes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10765">vier Buchstaben gefolgt von 5-31 Buchstaben oder Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10766">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10767">vier Buchstaben gefolgt von 5 bis 31 Buchstaben oder Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10768">Vier-Buchstaben-Bankleitzahl (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10769">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10770">4 bis 28 Buchstaben oder Ziffern (BBAN, Basic Bank Account Number)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10771">ein optionales Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10772">ein bis drei Buchstaben oder Ziffern (Rest der BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10773">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10774">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10775">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10776">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10777">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_swift findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10778">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_swift wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10815">Schweiz SSN-AHV-Nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10816">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10817">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10818">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10819">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10820">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10821">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10823">13-stellige Zahl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10824">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10825">13-stellige Zahl:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10826">drei Ziffern – 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10827">optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10828">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10829">optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10830">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10831">optionaler Punkt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10832">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10833">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10834">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10835">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10836">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10837">Die Funktion Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10838">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10839">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10840">Die Funktion Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10861">Nationale Identifikationsnummer Taiwans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10863">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch), gefolgt von neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10864">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10865">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch), gefolgt von neun Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10866">ein Buchstabe (in Englisch, ohne Zwischenfall)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10867">die Ziffer "1" oder "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10868">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10869">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10870">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10871">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10872">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10873">Die Funktion Func_taiwanese_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10874">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwanese_national_id wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10875">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10876">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10877">Die Funktion Func_taiwanese_national_id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10878">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10895">Taiwan-Reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10896">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10897">biometrische Reisepassnummer: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10898">nicht biometrische Reisepassnummer: neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10899">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10900">biometrische Reisepassnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10901">das Zeichen "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10902">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10903">nicht biometrische Reisepassnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10904">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10905">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10906">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10907">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10908">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10909">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_taiwan_passport, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10910">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwan_passport gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->

  </Pattern>

```
