## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10921">Nummer des in Taiwan ansässigen Zertifikats (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10923">10 Buchstaben und Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10924">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10925">10 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10926">zwei Buchstaben (keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10927">acht Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10928">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10929">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10930">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10931">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10932">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate, der dem Muster entspricht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10933">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10934">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10936">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10936">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10937">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10937">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10938">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10938">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10939">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10939">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10941">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10941">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10943">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10943">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10944">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10944">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10945">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10945">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10946">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10946">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10947">Identifikationscode der thailändischen Bevölkerung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10949">13 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10950">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10951">13 Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10952">erste Ziffer ist nicht null oder neun</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10953">12 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10954">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10955">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10956">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10957">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10958">Die Funktion Func_Thai_Citizen_Id nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10959">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10960">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10961">Die Funktion Func_Thai_Citizen_Id nach Inhalten, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10962">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10962">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10963">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10964">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10964">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10965">Identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10965">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10970">Nationale Identifikationsnummer der Türkei</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10972">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10973">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10974">11 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10975">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10976">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10977">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10978">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10979">Die Funktion Func_Turkish_National_Id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10980">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Turkish_National_Id gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10981">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10982">Die Funktion Func_Turkish_National_Id findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10983">Schlüsselwörter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10983">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10985">TC Kimlik Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10985">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10986">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10986">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10987">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10987">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10988">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10988">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10989">Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10990">Führerscheinnummer des Treibers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10992">Kombination aus 18 Buchstaben und Ziffern im angegebenen Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10993">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10994">18 Buchstaben und Ziffern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10995">Fünf Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung) oder die Ziffer "9" statt eines Buchstabens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10996">Eine Ziffer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10997">Fünf Ziffern im Datumsformat MMDDY für das Geburtsdatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10998">Das siebte Zeichen wird um 50 erhöht, wenn der Treiber weiblich ist. für exampe, 51 bis 62 statt 01 bis 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-10999">Zwei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung) oder die Ziffer "9" statt eines Buchstabens.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11000">Fünf Ziffern.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11001">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11002">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11003">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11004">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11005">Die Funktion `Func_uk_drivers_license` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11006">Es wird ein `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11007">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11008">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11009">Die Funktion `Func_uk_drivers_license` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11010">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11131">Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11132">Wahlrollennummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11133">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11134">zwei Buchstaben gefolgt von 1-4 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11135">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11136">zwei Buchstaben (ohne Groß-/Kleinschreibung), gefolgt von 1-4 Zahlen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11137">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11138">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11139">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11140">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11141">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_uk_electoral findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11142">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_electoral wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11149">Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11150">nationale Gesundheitsdienstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11152">10-17 Ziffern, durch Leerzeichen getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11153">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11154">10 bis 17 Stellen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11155">3 oder 10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11156">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11157">drei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11158">ein Leerzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11159">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11160">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11161">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11162">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11163">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11164">Die Funktion Func_uk_nhs_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11165">Eine der folgenden Bedingungen trifft zu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11166">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11167">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11168">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11169">Die Prüfsumme stimmt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11187">Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11188">nationale Versicherungsnummer (National Insurance Number, NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11189">Diese Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen ist im vertraulichen Informationstyp "NATIONALE IDENTIFIKATIONSNUMMER" der EU enthalten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11190">Es ist als eigenständige Entität vom Typ vertraulicher Informationen verfügbar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11192">sieben Zeichen oder neun Zeichen durch Leerzeichen oder Bindestriche getrennt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11193">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11194">zwei mögliche Muster:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11195">zwei Buchstaben (gültige NINOs verwenden nur bestimmte Zeichen in diesem Präfix, die durch dieses Muster überprüft werden; keine Groß-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11196">sechs Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11197">entweder "A", "B", "C" oder "D" (wie das Präfix sind nur bestimmte Zeichen im Suffix zulässig; keine Zwischen-/Kleinschreibung)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11198">ODER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11199">zwei Buchstaben</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11200">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11201">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11202">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11203">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11204">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11205">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11206">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11207">entweder "A", "B", "C" oder "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11208">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11209">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11210">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11211">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11212">Die Funktion Func_uk_nino findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11213">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_uk_nino wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11214">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11215">Die Funktion Func_uk_nino findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11237">Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11238">Eindeutige Steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11239">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11240">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11241">Kommunikationskonformitätsrichtlinien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11242">Information Governance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11243">Datensatzverwaltung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11244">Sicherheit von Microsoft Cloud App</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11246">10 Ziffern ohne Leerzeichen und Trennzeichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11247">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11248">10 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11248">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11249">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11250">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11250">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11251">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11252">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11253">Die Funktion  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11254">Es wird ein  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` Schlüsselwort aus gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11254">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11274">US-Bankkontonummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11276">6-17 Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11277">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11278">6-17 aufeinander folgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11279">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11280">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11281">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11282">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11283">Der reguläre Ausdruck Regex_usa_bank_account_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11284">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_usa_Bank_Account wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11314">Us.S. Driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11316">Abhängig vom Bundesstaat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11317">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11318">hängt vom Zustand ab – z. B. New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11319">Neun Ziffern, die wie ddd ddd ddd formatiert sind, entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11320">Neun Ziffern wie ddddddddd werden nicht übereinstimmen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11321">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11322">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11323">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11324">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11325">Die Funktion Func_new_york_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11326">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11327">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11328">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11329">Die Funktion Func_new_york_drivers_license_number findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11330">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11331">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11332">Es wurde kein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_us_drivers_license gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11430">Us.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11432">neun Ziffern, die mit einer "9" beginnen und eine "7" oder "8" als vierte Ziffer enthalten, optional formatiert mit Leerzeichen oder Bindestrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11433">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11434">formatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11435">die Ziffer "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11436">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11437">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11438">eine "7" oder "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11439">eine Ziffer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11440">ein Leerzeichen oder Bindestrich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11441">vier Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11442">unformatiert:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11443">die Ziffer "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11444">zwei Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11445">eine "7" oder "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11446">fünf Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11447">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11448">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11449">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11450">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11451">Die Funktion Func_formatted_itin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11452">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_itin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11453">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11454">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_itin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11455">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_itin wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11456">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11457">Die Funktion Func_formatted_itin oder Func_unformatted_itin findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11472">Us.S. Social Security Number (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11474">neun Ziffern, die in einem formatierten oder unformatierten Muster vorliegen können</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11475">Wenn er vor Mitte 2011 ausgegeben wird, verfügt ein SSN über eine starke Formatierung, bei der bestimmte Teile der Zahl innerhalb bestimmter Bereiche liegen müssen, um gültig zu sein (es gibt jedoch keine Prüfsumme).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11476">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11477">Vier Funktionen suchen nach SSNs in vier verschiedenen Mustern:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11478">Func_ssn findet SSNs mit starker Formatierung vor 2011, die mit Strichen oder Leerzeichen formatiert sind (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn sucht SSNs mit starker Formatierung vor 2011, die als neun aufeinander folgende Ziffern unformatiert sind (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn findet nach 2011 SSNs, die mit Strichen oder Leerzeichen formatiert sind (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn nach 2011 SSNs, die als neun aufeinander folgende Ziffern unformatiert sind (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11482">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11483">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11484">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11485">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11486">Die Funktion Func_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11487">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11488">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11489">Die Funktion Func_unformatted_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11490">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11491">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11492">Die Funktion Func_randomized_formatted_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11493">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11494">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat eine geringe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11495">Die Funktion Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11496">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_ssn wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11511">USA/Vereinigtes Königreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11512">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11514">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11515">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11516">neun aufeinander folgende Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11517">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11518">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11519">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11520">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat hohe Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11521">Die Funktion Func_usa_uk_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11522">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11523">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wurde gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11524">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11525">Die Funktion Func_usa_uk_passport findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11526">Ein Schlüsselwort aus `Keywords_eu_passport_number` oder `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wird gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11543">Dieser vertrauliche Informationstyp ist nur für die Verwendung in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11543">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11544">Richtlinien zur Verhinderung von Datenverlust</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11544">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11549">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11549">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11551">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11552">neun Ziffern</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11552">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11553">Prüfsumme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11554">Nein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11555">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11556">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11557">Der regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11558">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11558">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11574">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11574">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11576">Muster</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11576">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11582">Definition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11583">Eine DLP-Richtlinie hat mittlere Sicherheit, dass sie diese Art vertraulicher Informationen erkannt hat, wenn innerhalb einer Nähe von 300 Zeichen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11584">Der regex-Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International findet Inhalte, die dem Muster entsprechen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11584">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="2bac5-11585">Ein Schlüsselwort aus Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International gefunden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2bac5-11585">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
